description.raw:
There are several tests that are [always failing](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/GazeboDefault/job/gazebo-ci_BTCoverage-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/27/testReport/) during our coverage build of the default branch.

* The largest set of tests is related to a simbody run-time error when compiled in coverage mode (gazebo issue #1849). I tracked this down to the use of the `-fno-elide-constructors` compiler flag and [reported upstream](https://github.com/simbody/simbody/issues/468). I propose disabling the tests for now in coverage mode, since it's unclear whether a fix would be backported.

* The `test_fixture` standalone example has a linking error during coverage builds (undefined reference to `__gcov_init`, `__gcov_merge_add`). I propose disabling that portion of the examples build test as well.
description.html:
There are several tests that are always failing during our coverage build of the default branch.

  • The largest set of tests is related to a simbody run-time error when compiled in coverage mode (gazebo issue #1849). I tracked this down to the use of the -fno-elide-constructors compiler flag and reported upstream. I propose disabling the tests for now in coverage mode, since it's unclear whether a fix would be backported.

  • The test_fixture standalone example has a linking error during coverage builds (undefined reference to __gcov_init, __gcov_merge_add). I propose disabling that portion of the examples build test as well.

title: Fix coverage tests
